description: A ero-configuration, non-distributed, JSON-based document storage and analysis module focusing on the manipulation,                     grouping and filtering of unstructured data from various sources. MapReduce is also supported for more advanced                     analysis methods. Query syntax is similar to SQL-Alchemys filter method.

info.Keywords:: unstructured data analysis nosql map reduce mapreduce sql alchemy

longdescription: A ero-configuration, non-distributed, JSON-based document storage and analysis module focusing on the manipulation,                     grouping and filtering of unstructured data from various sources. MapReduce is also supported for more advanced                     analysis methods. Query syntax is similar to SQL-Alchemys filter method.
